attributes.action: Scrap plans to introduce compulsary inspection of private homes for the purpose of calculating council tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This constitutes a basic infringement of peoples' civil rights and privacy and is a flawed basis for calculating householders liability for the costs of local services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
